amendment.description: To provide additional amounts for emergency management performance grants, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 3708 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3708.

Amendment SA 3708 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S3691-3692; text: CR S3691) To provide additional amounts for emergency management performance grants, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3708 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Byrd.
